title: One Bert Show Member Owes Two Listeners An Apology
description:
Typically Bert is open to talking to listeners when they approach him. But on this particular day, Bert was embarrassed by the items he was buying at the store. Because of this, he owes a few listeners an apology.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
